title: Can someone cheer me up?
body:
Shit kinda just went down hill in real life at my house

Too personal to share, but I feel like shit and could use a laugh

Thanks

Edit
**You people are the best, thanks a lot**

Situation resolved, I'm good, everything is fine

THANKS AGAIN

replies.body:
<Old Chinese man accent.>
Remember, young one.  Man who run behind car get exhausted.  Man who run in front of car get tired.
I lol hard because my step dad uses that one too

Do you like birds? Do you like explosions?

http://i.imgur.com/jGMtJIb.gif
Beautiful
Hold on a second, I've got just the thing

https://media.giphy.com/media/12ELmx0C4EFKcE/giphy.gif
https://67.media.tumblr.com/04b18c2bc964a69dc56efbf6ffb3f831/tumblr_n1dyc90Wxr1tti72eo1_400.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/aGVvqGKFOXIvC/giphy.gif
http://www.cat-gifs.com/w3/CAT-GIF-Aww-Cute-Kitten-stretching-on-back-and-yawning.gif
Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iFj68naA,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-08T23:40:01.873+0000)
>
> Shit kinda just went down hill in real life at my house
> 
> Too personal to share, but I feel like shit and could use a laugh
> 
> Thanks
> 
> Edit
> **You people are the best, thanks a lot**

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http%3A%2F%2Fvignette2.wikia.nocookie.net%2Fmlp%2Fimages%2F1%2F1d%2FPinkie_Pie_Gala_Fantasy_S1E3.png%2Frevision%2F20121023062315&imgrefurl=http%3A%2F%2Fmlp.wikia.com%2Fwiki%2FPinkie_Pie%2FGallery&docid=tykcU1T-Y9KdVM&tbnid=i1V8WwBOGCDuYM%3A&w=1280&h=720&bih=955&biw=1920&ved=0ahUKEwiM0-eYr-XNAhUF7oMKHXFMCtsQMwg2KAQwBA&iact=mrc&uact=8

Pinkie Pie will make ANYONE happy. Look at that smile!

For real, I hope everything's OK. It's always sad to hear when someone's having a really bad day. Best of wishes.
*Resisting Urges to Stab little pink horse of insanity*

Of course you don't stab it.

*gives bat*

It's a pinata. real horses don't come in pink.

_Rapidly Swings Bat Faster Than Udyr, Xin Zhao and Jax Combined, after 243 swings pauses and looks down_

Since when do pinata's bleed?

No no, That was me, caught my arm with the first dozen swings or so. I'm fine though, crab's don't feel pain.

*picks up arm*

Besides even if that wasn't a pinata at this point it probably doesn't matter, as it is a crater now.

**PHEW**

Thought I would have a serious incident that would involve PITA for a minute there.

I would have had to rat out {{champion:77}} to them if that was the case, after all, his fur is real
Peta only get's mad if people hurt animals, so even if they come just tell them I did it. I'm a crab I can get away with this stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iFj68naA,comment-id=000a000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T03:26:02.438+0000)
>
> Peta only get's mad if people hurt animals, so even if they come just tell them I did it. I'm a crab I can get away with this stuff.

lol-ing this whole chain.

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iFj68naA,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-07-09T02:56:16.156+0000)
>
> *Resisting Urges to Stab little pink horse of insanity*

But...Party of One. :(
CRAB MADE ME KILL IT

This sounds serious. Better call in the seals:
 
 http://33.media.tumblr.com/0530f022553c418f85753c039f8eadf8/tumblr_inline_nbpegsdBHB1riqfqx.gif

 http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m0mt1rbKc11rof6a0o1_250.gif

 https://31.media.tumblr.com/618d1f0378cd1ac891d9fa90d4026884/tumblr_inline_n1ihbsks8M1rccqfz.gif

 http://www.gifmania.fr/Gif-Animes-Animaux/Animations-Animaux-Marins/Images-Phoques/Phoques-73435.gif

I don't have a lot, But have this krabby.
https://i.gyazo.com/89ea74ec3d583ba9395c69668ea6c557.gif
He has some stage fright.

*pulls out knife and hands it to him*

Here... I know you're gonna try and steal one anyway

*gives a different knife back*

I've already stolen enough.

Seriously why did you have so many.

Well I use them in close combat

Throwing weapons

And

"Shrapnel" bombs

So... It would be awkward if I ran out mid fight

You know, I'm imagining just the one time where you end up pulling out a krabby instead of a knife. you just throw a krabby at someone and both you and your opponent just end up completely confused.

Also, just realized that I'm pretty sure kitty darkstar was the first person to comment. ship reaffirmed.

**Picks up Crabby**

No...

**Drop kicks back to the sea**

I have too many damn Cat ships

At least you have ships.
https://i.gyazo.com/c14a1fa625065e5f6328eda8eb4f24b1.png

Quit being so Crabby about it

We ship you with the scuttle
I like this logic.

Basically I use the same dimension corridor Teemo stores his shrooms in to get my knives 

Explains why it's called "Two Shiv Poison" and why they slow

https://media.giphy.com/media/hEwST9KM0UGti/giphy.gif
Have a pug good sir.

same here

just do like me, don't bother, live, and be our favorite shaco main and board criminal purgatory (not me pls).

To get you would involve a lot of dimension breaking

I'll settle for your cousins for now, you haven't been to bad
thank you!!! hope you fixe your issues quickly.

I don't know what you're going through man, but I brought you this gift

http://img11.deviantart.net/b0ce/i/2015/139/0/e/_cm_rek_sai_has_had_enough_of_your_shit_teemo_by_xxkikaru_chanxx-d8txfab.jpg

Stab away.

The Mexican magician said he'd disappear at three.

He said uno, dos... but disappeared without a trace.

Sorry I am late to the party. You know I was just ~~sleeping~~ working. Working very haaaarrrddd. 
Want to see my present?
http://img.pandawhale.com/120346-kuzco-dancing-grooving-gif-Img-sqE3.gif

Nice eh. 

I'm very depressed, I'll tell you why.
https://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lrb908v6Ni1qm6oc3o1_500.gif

Hope you enjoy seeing dogs hitting humans.

https://media1.giphy.com/media/j3iGKfXRKlLqw/giphy.gif

Or this

https://media0.giphy.com/media/Erdir7jUdwhvG/giphy.gif

Follow ur dreams
http://i.imgur.com/PIk9U.gif

Although humor is subjective, here's a couple silly videos for everyone.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fZSdRCnDmyo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vFpB-MbNj0

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Jfx57q1Jxw
Cool, thank you
You're welcome, hope at least someone laughs at them.
AWWW "you people" includes me; that you means I'm the best and u wuv me ! YAY <3<3<3<3

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXsQAXx_ao0

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=VAVLOHbqWd4

https://media.giphy.com/media/10Ce0RO17e2af6/giphy.gif
Just kidding, here is a seal for a good mood 
https://media.riffsy.com/images/f9d518ffe4131464915db1b0eed8783d/raw

Well i was saving this gem for later but-tttt. Since you need it.

I've found your soul mate.

http://pre09.deviantart.net/d6c0/th/pre/i/2014/188/d/1/lol_crackpairing___rengar_x_shaco_by_christin_cat_bat-d7pmr9p.png

Now you and Chaos can "ambush" around.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/5747ccf0fcc5320cd08075f3a1cb62ac/tumblr_nwyrdcA6KY1uac1tpo1_400.gif
WHAT HAVE YOU DONE!
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/degrassi/images/e/e0/Robin-Thicke-I-Know-You-Want-It-Blurred-Lines.gif/revision/latest?cb=20131110060436
Thanks ! I was just about to say...
Say what?
I wholeheartedly approve of Worst Mord''s choice, and was about to post something else to "cheer you up" ...

This idea scares me...

But post anyway
